en.about:
Aims of this workshop

  • To share a personal [anonymously or not] or collective story which has impacted us.
  • To respond to the randomly assigned stories by writing another story, providing solutions, giving emotional support, suggesting creative proposals.
  • Community building and healing through meaningful conversations.
en.story_keywords: Keywords. please separte the terms using commas
en.starting_soon: Thanks for your time, in a few minutes we are going to start

es.about:
Objetivos del taller

  • Compartir una historia personal [en anonimato o no], colectiva o social que nos haya impactado.
  • Responder a las historias distribuidas aleatoriamente por ejemplo: añadiendo a la historia, aportando soluciones críticas, dando apoyo emocional, proponiendo propuestas creativas novedosas.
  • Construir comunidad y sanación a través de conversaciones profundas o significativas.
es.no_workshop_currently_available: No hay taller por el momento
es.starting_soon: Gracias por tu tiempo, en unos minutos vamos a empezar.
